Dragons's Dice Gaming Club

Welcome to the Dragon's Dice gaming club, Portishead's hottest new club for minature wargames, tabletop games and card games!
Join us for our regular weekly games nights, or sign up for one of our upcoming events!

About Us

Based out of St Mary's Church Hall in Portishead, Dragon's Dice Gaming Club runs regular gaming evenings, supporting a varetiy of tabletop and card games including: Warhammer 40,000; Warhammer Age of Sigmar; Magic: the Gathering; Star Wars Legion; Halo Flashpoint and many more!

In addition to regular gaming sessions, Dragon's Dice Gaming Club also runs periodic events, ranging from tournaments to narrative events. Whether you a casual gamer, competative tournament player or a complete newcomer, there is an event for every level of play.

As part of our mission to promote Gaming as a positive force for good, many of our events are run to support local charities, with the proceeds raised going to good Causes such as Cancer Research UK and Mental Health Awareness, among others.

If you would like to know more, you can send us your questions using the "Get in Touch" button at the top of the page.

What we stand for

Dragon's Dice Gaming Club is committed to providing an inclusive safe space for tabletop games from all walks of life. We believe everyone deserves to be able to enjoy tabletop gaming, and as such we operate a zero tolerance policy to harassment and abuse in this club. Everyone is welcome at Dragon's Dice gaming - all we ask is that you treat each other with respect and have some fun rolling dice with each other.

Join Us!

In addition to our open regular gaming evenings, Dragon's Dice Gaming also offers a membership subscription - for a monthly fee of £3, members gain access to our monthly newsletter, get discounts on tickets for paid events, get access to our special club events, as well as being entered into our Charity Prize Draw!
If you would like to join Dragon's Dice Gaming Club as a full member, click below to fill out our entry form and get more details!

Sign up

Location - St Mary's Hall

We are based out of St Mary's Hall in Portishead, on the outskirts of the town by St Mary's Church. The Hall itself has tables to run five-six games simultaneously, as well as on-site parking and an site kitchen with tea, coffee and snacks available for purchase.
Dragons Dice Gaming club provides several boxes of terrain for use in games, covering a range of styles and systems, but we recommend people bring their own terrain when they can - It let's us run more tables of games and besides, the more terrain the cooler the game looks!

Weekly Events

Dragon's Dice Gaming club run several regular activities every week which are free for everyone to attend.

Midweek Gaming - Warhammer: Every Wednesday we focus on runnning games from the popular Warhammer franchises - Warhammer 40,000, Age of Sigmar, Kill-Team, the Horus Heresy and more.

Paint and Chill - Every Friday we run regular meetings to just hang out and build/paint models - whether you want to focus on getting some models done or just chill out, all are welcome.

Weekend Gaming - at the Weekends, our tables are open for whatever you want to play, be it more Warhammer, card games like Magic: the Gathering, or smaller systems like Infinity or Halo: Flashpoint. Just turn up and play!

Please note that due to the cost of hiring the hall, there is a £5 entry fee for non-members wishing to attend the regular activities

Weekly Timetable

Thursday N/A No Event

Saturday 10:30 - 19:00 Weekend Gaming
